amendment.description: Amendment replaced language in the bill concerning the use of funds provided for family planning/reproductive health.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert provisions to Section 622 to prevent unintended pregnancies, abortions,and the transmission of sexually transmitted infections, including HIV/AIDS; and to provide that no contract or grant for exclusive purpose of providing donated contraceptives in developing countries shall be denied to any nongovernmental organization solely on the basis of the policy contained in the President's March 28, 2001, Memorandum to the Administrator of USAID with respect to providing contraceptives in developing countries, or any comparable administration policy regarding the provision of contraceptives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowey amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 201 (Roll no. 533).
